content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, we begin with the April 11, 1950, episode from The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe titled, The Anniversary Gift.

(29:56) Dragnet provides our second story with their episode, The Big Chet. That one originally aired April 5, 1953.

Download CaseClosed764
